item.title: 2023-02-03-new-post
item.description: this is new page I post test insert a picture details about my problem I inserted a image following the tutorial, but there is not image shown, there is only a broken icon reminding me the failure. I browse around and search the solution, all of them is out of date. I have to ask Stackoverflow for help. Hope someone can help me what’s going on as soon as possible.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
